detail_desc: Large metal earrings.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Sleeveless V-neck top in soft jersey with twisted shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the front.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood. Faux fur trim around the hood, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Patterned bikini. Fully lined top in a high cut at the front with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a plastic fastener at the back. Fully lined bottoms.

High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide, elasticated panel to hold in and shape the waist and sculpting seams at the back to showcase the body’s physique. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Calf-length circular skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a concealed button and zip at one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fabric cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable tab at the back.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, covered elastic at the hem and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
T-shirt in printed jersey.

Dungaree shorts in soft, marled sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and straps that cross at the back and have adjustable fasteners at the front. Kangaroo pocket with a print motif and appliqués, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a grandad collar, classic front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length coat in a brushed weave with narrow notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening, dropped shoulders and flap front pockets. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Wide, straight-cut shirt in a soft cupro weave with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sun caps in an airy cotton weave with a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck. One cap with an all-over print.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Romper suit in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves with buttons on one shoulder and long legs with buttons from the crotch to the hems.
Playsuit in soft lace with flounces at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, and short legs. Jersey lining.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.

Double-breasted coat in an Italian wool blend with large, wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. One inner pocket with a button, and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Sandals with narrow straps at the front, a heel strap and fluted soles.
Joggers in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Comfort blankets in an airy cotton weave, one with an all-over print. Size 60x60 cm.
Plastic chokers, one elasticated.
Blouse in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, lace yoke, small lace frill at the shoulders and an elasticated seam under the bust.

Straight-cut blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, decorative embroidery and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Small frill trim around the collar and cuffs.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, superstretch twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Shorter, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.

All-in-one suit in soft, patterned velour made from an organic cotton blend with a small appliqué at the top. Jersey-lined hood with ears, a zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Wide, straight-cut, calf-length dress in soft, gently draping satin with a sheen. V-neck and a yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long, gathered, voluminous balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and close-fitting cuffs with a covered button. Short slits in the sides.

Patterned jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft cotton velvet with a frilled collar, buttons down the back and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric. Unlined.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Body in lace and mesh with a deep V-neck at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a lined gusset and string back.
Slightly shorter, straight-cut top in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, lace at the top and adjustable spaghetti straps.
5-pocket low-rise shorts in twill with hard-worn details, a button fly and skinny legs with seams across the front.

Set with two hats, two scarves and a pair of bootees in soft cotton jersey. Hats with sewn-on ears at the top and an embroidery detail on the turned-up hem. Double-layered scarves with a press-stud at one side. Bootees with foldover ribbing at the top and soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Jersey lining.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Cropped top in printed satin with a sheen. V-neck, ties at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a smocked section at the back. Partly lined.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Top with concealed press-studs on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Earrings in hammered metal with square pendants. Length 4.5 cm.
Short satin skirt with a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Large metal earrings with tear-shaped plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 7 cm.

Set with a top and dungarees in soft jersey. Top with an all-over print, press-studs at the back, dropped shoulders and half-length flounced sleeves. Dungarees with press-studs at the back and straps with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
All-in-one suit in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with raglan sleeves and ribbed trims. Buttons along one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs.

Short shirt dress in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, pearly press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Low, imitation leather sandals with an elasticated heel strap. Rubber insoles and soles.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort, side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with a fastener and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with taped details and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable belt with metal D-rings at the waist. Unlined.
Vest top in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a slit and covered buttons at the cuffs, and a curved hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck wrapover front and short trumpet sleeves. Deep V-neck at the back ending in a hook-and-eye fastening and concealed zip, a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist and long, wide legs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, a double-layered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs. Rounded hem.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket, short puff sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Small embroidery detail at the front.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Knee-length, fitted nursing dress in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves, a wrapover at the top and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Imitation suede sandals with open toes and heels, an elastic strap at the back and shiny block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
